data.details:
Troupe Performer (S)
Grades: 9, 10
Performance is a powerful way to make an impact on an audience, and a perfect way to put your leadership into action. It's also a fun way to sharpen your communication skills, learn to handle stress with grace, strengthen your teamwork skills, and grow relationships and networks. Get out there and show your stuffâ€”put on a show! You might even have the chance to perform at the Riverside Art Walk Poetry Festival the evening of April 6, 2016. 
*This event is for 2016 registered Girl Scouts, and registered & approved adult volunteers.
* For safety and supervision reasons, troops and individuals are not permitted to bring non-Girl Scouts or siblings. 
*Girl/adult ratios must be followed and adults are expected to stay on the premises during the event. 

$15/girl, $1/adult
Contact: Brittany McCallister 904.389.3071
